title: ViewerWebglConfig
description: An instance of the viewer webgl configuration.

alpha.title: Alpha
alpha.description: Does the canvas has an alpha buffer?

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Does the drawing buffer has at least a 16bits depth buffer?

stencil.title: Stencil
stencil.description: Does the drawing buffer has at least a 8bits stencil buffer?

antialias.title: Antialias
antialias.description: Does anti-alising has to be done?

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Does the drawing buffer has at least 16bits depth.

premultipliedAlpha.title: Depth
premultipliedAlpha.description: Does the drawing buffer contains colors with premultiplied alpha?

preserveDrawingBuffer.title: Preserve Drawing Buffer
preserveDrawingBuffer.description: Does the drawing buffer is preserved? Need to be activated for using toDataURL on the canvas.

failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat.title: Fail If Major Performance Caveat
failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat.description: Does context will be created even if the performance are low.
